body:
Comment 4: 
Updated tarball for s/os.Error/error/.

Bug still occurs.


qaoob:underscore-test-bug bradfitz$ make
6g   -p golang.org/bugdemo -o _go_.6 bugdemo.go
rm -f _obj/golang.org/bugdemo.a
gopack grc _obj/golang.org/bugdemo.a _go_.6 

qaoob:underscore-test-bug bradfitz$ gotest
rm -f _test/golang.org/bugdemo.a
rm -f _test/golang.org/bugdemo.a
gopack grc _test/golang.org/bugdemo.a _gotest_.6 
_testmain.go:3: syntax error: unexpected ., expecting name or @ or ?
gotest: "/Users/bradfitz/go/bin/6g -I _test _testmain.go" failed: exit status 1
Attachments: 1. bugdemo.tar.gz (644 bytes)
